XPRESSplot¶

About¶

XPRESSplot is a part of the XPRESSyourself suite of sequencing tools. XPRESSplot is a Python toolkit for navigating and analyzing gene expression (Microarray or RNAseq) datasets. Features include the ability to import GEO-accessible datasets and metadata or your own datasets, clean, normalize, and analyze sequence data.

XPRESSplot and the XPRESSyourself suite is developed and maintained by Jordan Berg in the Rutter Lab @ the University of Utah, along with other collaborators.
